content.rendered:
[et_pb_section bb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ next_background_color=”#000000″][et_pb_fullwidth_header header_fullscreen=”on” header_scroll_down=”on” scroll_down_icon_size=”30px” module_class=”full-width-landing” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ background_image=”https://cyberianmine.de/wp-content/uploads/hand-cyberian-mine.jpg”]

Get yourself a hosted miner

The simplest way to start earning is with one our hosted machines

Receive a regular crypto income

[/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section bb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ prev_background_color=”#000000″][et_pb_row custom_padding=”||22px||false|false” _builder_version=”3.13.1″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Heading – Start mining with us” module_class=”headings” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ saved_tabs=”all”]

Get a dedicated miner, through us. We do the rest

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_margin=”25px||25px|” disabled_on=”off|off|off” module_class=”quote-block” _builder_version=”3.13.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Quote title” _builder_version=”3.13.1″]

What if my unit fails?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Quote content” module_class=”large” _builder_version=”3.13.1″]

We use unique proprietary technology to make sure smooth and stable hashrate at all times. When your miner fails or underperforms, we provide Automatic Hot Swap from our backup reserve fund for the whole time your device is not functional.
Moreover, we cover all repair and maintenance costs, it all completely happens behind the scenes and you enjoy your hassle-free experience.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_margin=”||70px|” _builder_version=”3.13.1″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”How does it work?” module_class=”headings” _builder_version=”3.13.1″]

How does it work?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.13.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Bring us to your network” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ custom_padding=”||25px|”]

Choose a miner

 

Pick a model from the miners we’ve already setup for you, from pre-orders or internal Marketplace.

No need to worry about the technical side of things, or running a noisy machine at home.

All our machines run on low-cost renewable hydropower.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Grow your idea, with us” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ custom_padding=”||25px|”]

Build up a passive income

 

You will receive a steady income of the cryptocurrency of your choice.

You’ll need a crypto wallet, but we can help you set that up too.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Surprise us” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ custom_padding=”||25px|”]

Sit back. We do the rest

 

You don’t need to do anything else.

You receive the power of the miner that is installed and hosted in our green energy facilities. We have onsite engineers to make sure it’s always on and running.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding=”59px||||false|false” custom_margin=”||40px|” _builder_version=”3.13.1″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”What does the price include?” module_class=”headings” _builder_version=”3.13.1″]

What does the initial fee include?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row module_class=”quote-block” _builder_version=”3.13.1″][et_pb_column type=”2_3″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Quote content” module_class=”large” _builder_version=”3.13.1″]

The fee at checkout includes:

  • Your exclusive lifetime right to use the power of a dedicated miner (with specific serial number) of your choice in our facilities
  • All repairs (and time to do that) covered (while hosted by us)
  • Automatic Hot Swap (when unit fails or underperforms, hash rate is provided from one of our backup-machines
  • Stable hashrate for as long as you pay the hosting fee.
  • Historical Hashrate average: 96% of nominal hash rate
  • Each machine is installed for you at our facilities, you earn your mining rewards direct to your own crypto wallet. No need to pay for Power Supply Unit, Delivery from China, Customs clearance, Rack slot, All cabling, electrical and installation costs.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Quote title” _builder_version=”3.13.1″]

We’re always helping to make mining profitable for our community.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding=”0|0px|0|0px|false|false” _builder_version=”3.13.1″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.13.1″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_end=”#35a0ff” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_cta title=”Welcome-bonus 25€” button_text=”Click Here” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ use_background_color=”off”]

Check out our features and available miners for yourself right on the platform.
Look into the marketplace for other users’ offers. Check out pre-orders for next batches.
Test it all with a smallest unit – 10% piece of a shared miner.

Sign up now. No strings attached.

[/et_pb_cta][et_pb_button button_url=”https://my.cyberianmine.de/users/sign_up” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Sign Up and get 25€ for hosting!” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ box_shadow_style=”preset3″ background_layout=”dark” animation_direction=”top” /][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding=”0|0px|27px|0px|false|false” custom_margin=”70px||70px|” module_class=”quote-block” _builder_version=”3.13.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Quote title” _builder_version=”3.13.1″]

Any Questions?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Quote content” module_class=”large” _builder_version=”3.13.1″]

After you have looked through our FAQ Section, please feel free to contact us at info@cyberianmine.de. We’re happy to answer anything.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
